column5: Got out on Lake O this morning! Got the top up before the rain hit! Rob and I managed to get two Browns, his was a little nicer size but I didn't get a pic of it. Water temps were 40-41.5 degrees off Jordan.
Nice fish - aside from the rain - it looks like it was a nice day out there.  Sure wish my boat had a top to put up!  Don

WAY TO GO..  ..thanks for the report,and the pic,im sure glad that the fishing is really starting to pick up on the south shore i hope to be at port dalhoiuse real soon we always catch alot of fish every year at this time all around jordon to the welland canal....cheers
Right on, way to go.  We saw some boats out there as we drove by.  Wonder if you were one of them.  Its nice to get out on the open water eh  Joey
Good work Dax! I hope the F-90 was purring nicely.  :-)
